title: Hunter Units & Roles
description: Learn about the elite hunter squads and their specialties!

questions.question: What is the combat role of the 'Main Vocal' position?
questions.explanation: Main Vocals use their voice to heal wounds and cleanse curses. Their sustained notes create healing auras for the entire unit!

questions.question: The 'Center' position is responsible for coordinating unit formations during combat.
questions.explanation: Centers act as the tactical core - their position in choreography isn't just for looks, it's optimal for directing battle formations!

questions.question: What weapon type do 'Main Dancers' typically wield?
questions.explanation: Main Dancers are melee specialists - their precise body control translates to deadly sword and blade techniques!

questions.question: Which unit specialization handles dream-realm demons?
questions.explanation: The Nightmare Division specializes in entering dreams to fight demons that attack sleeping victims. Their concept? Dark and haunting, of course!

questions.question: Rappers use their fast lyrics to cast rapid-fire spell attacks.
questions.explanation: Rapper positions are essentially combat mages - their fast flows allow them to cast multiple spells in quick succession!

questions.question: What is a 'Sub-Unit' in KPDH?

options.text: A specialized strike team from a main unit

questions.explanation: Sub-Units are specialized teams formed from main units for specific mission types - stealth ops, heavy assault, etc.!

questions.question: What happens when a unit achieves 'Perfect All-Kill'?
questions.explanation: A Perfect All-Kill means the unit has achieved perfect synchronization with fan energy across all metrics - their power multiplies exponentially!

questions.question: Solo hunters are considered more powerful than unit hunters.
questions.explanation: Units are stronger because synchronized performances multiply power. Solo hunters are skilled but lack the exponential boost of unit synchronization!
